name: Saving Christmas (E. server)
description:
You awaken in a village in the middle of nowhere called "Christmas Heart", the inhabitants of said village require your help! They have been getting attacked by a horde of snowmen, intent on destroying the town and stopping christmas.

All you can think to do is defeat wave upon wave of snowmen, with your trusty bow in hand and a few logs to construct some simple defenses.

Good Luck!

Game uses your average controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Aim (zoom)

Made by the "E-server" development team! We hope you have as much fun playing this, as we did making it!
